2.short_description: RITM1002025855 - Manual action for broken orders. Partial cancellation mostly
2.description: The orders are still in 250 status. Can you please check it? Thank you
2.resolution_notes: we performed manual actions, but they failed because the order structure is broken. The order has now been parked in the Failure List and will be handled through the Force Closure activity once it is older than three months from the order creation date.
